title.value: Зарубежный опыт организации и ведения предпринимательской деятельности в овощеводстве
Foreign experience in organization and transaction of vegetable production business
Foreign experience in organization and transaction of vegetable production business

journal.title: Agropanorama : scientific and technical journal for the agro-industrial complex workers

person.name: Lovkis, O.V., Belarus State Agrarian Technical Univ., Minsk (Belarus)

abstract.value: Vegetable and fruit producing appears one of the most important sources of supplying of population with vitamin, dietary and medicinal products. Government of economically developed countries support national programs aimed on the development of the branch. The article represents an overview of the foreign experience upon the problem of organization of business in the sphere of vegetable and fruit producing. The main goal of the research appears a complex analysis of the peculiarities of horticultural production organization, development of cooperation and integration between production enterprises and evaluation of the main directions of state support. The basic legal forms of business in vegetable growing in the United States, European countries and China are considered. The article presents the main aspects of cooperation and integration of horticultural branch, main peculiarities of sale and state support of horticultural producing enterprises in foreign countries.
